channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging trees including rose bushes on public pavement, 4th July
item.description:
You have to walk out into the road to avoid low branches and being injured by rose bush thorns. Exceptionally dangerous at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westgate Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing litter bin outside Fossdene School, 4th July
item.description:
Food waste spilling out all over over pavement. Unhygienic especially with so many children around.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Way, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned biffa bin, 4th July
item.description:
There is a Biffa bin that appears to have been abandoned for over a week. It is located on 155 NEW CROSS ROAD. as consequence, it has begun to emit strong, unpleasant odours and is attracting a significant number of flies. This is creating an unsanitary and unpleasant environment for residents and passers-by. I would be grateful if you could arrange for its removal or proper management as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Friendly Street, Deptford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smell of dead animal coming from chimney stack, 4th July
item.description:
The smell is coming through the air vents BIO HAZARD
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82-116, Alderwood Road, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 4th July
item.description:
I witnessed this man dumping his waste at corner of the alley way , while I was litter picking.I continued litter picking and came back past where his van was and saw that he did not take his waste with him

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethelbert Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Runny green poo, 4th July
item.description:
Outside number 15 shed there is a green runny non solid poo. I reported to estate cleaner next door and she said she would report to st saviours person but not removed yet. If you go upstairs next to the corner shop. It's in front of the houses there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Floyd Road AGAIN, 4th July
item.description:
Absolute mess at end of Floyd Road. Overflowing Biffa bins fron retail outlets with bags and bags of rubbish on top and around. This is a health hazard especially in this hot weather. PLEASE GET THIS STOPPED.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
